Description.Text: Located in the commercial district of Shmeisani,the hotel is within a walking distance from shopping centers. It is a 10-minute drive from the Amman Citadel and 25 km by car from Queen Alia International Airport. High-end restaurants and entertainment facilities are within a walking distance.

This luxurious hotel features a 24 hour business centre offering secretarial services. All rooms include a satellite LCD TV. On-site facilities include a spa and swimming pool. WIFI and parking are available.
